import React from 'react' function StackOp(props) { const {gr,setGr,ch,st} = props const pushValue = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const value = document.getElementById("input1").value const myStruc = (st.find(e => e.id === ch).tile) //array of coordinates const newGrid = gr.slice() const myIndex = myStruc[index] const i0 = myIndex[0] const i1 = myIndex[1] const tile = newGrid[i0][i1] const newTile= { ...tile, text:`${value}` } newGrid[i0][i1] = newTile setGr(newGrid) } return (
see items
) } export default StackOp props
